text: A Tale of Two Cities is a 1935 American romance drama movie directed by Jack Conway and Robert Z. Leonard. It was based on the 1859 novel of the same name by Charles Dickens and starring Ronald Coleman, Elizabeth Allan, Edna May Oliver, Reginald Owen, Basil Rathbone, Donald Woods, Blanche Yurka, Mitchell Lewis. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1937. ==Other websites== * * Category:1935 romantic drama movies Category:1930s American romance movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Jack Conway Category:Movies directed by Robert Z. Leonard Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Paris Category:MGM movies
title: A Tale of Two Cities (1935 movie)
